LanguageData.RawCoom.label: Testojuice
LanguageData.RawCoom.description: Milky "juice" harvested from a testolope. Absolutely disgusting, but still provides some of the effects of testosterone.
LanguageData.Coom.label: testosterone
LanguageData.Coom.description: Refined testosterone. When injected it gets you JUICED UP.
LanguageData.Coomalope.label: Testolope
LanguageData.Coomalope.description: A sign of the depraved extent of GymBro science, the Testolope grows hairy sacks on its back which can be "milked" for testofluid.
